column5: i just went through the bussiness directory to see who the drywallers are on this forum ...and much to my surprise...there isnt any ....  Ive got 10 000 sq of board to hang tape and mud and california knockdown ceiling to be sprayed...if interested give me a pm and we can discuss this further....the timing couldnt be any better then right now for someone to have a working /fishing vacation ...  Cheers
